label: Literary Analysis
description: Analyze themes, structure, and techniques in literary texts.

label: Critical Reading
description: Critically read and interpret texts, identifying arguments and evidence.

label: Apply Literary Theory
description: Use literary and critical theories to interpret texts and craft arguments.

label: Genre & Conventions
description: Identify and apply conventions specific to literary and media genres.

label: Narrative Structure
description: Analyze and evaluate narrative organization and storytelling techniques.

label: Creative Writing
description: Compose original creative texts (stories, scripts, or other genres).

label: Revision & Editing
description: Revise and edit writing for clarity, coherence, and audience impact.

label: Research Methods
description: Locate, evaluate, and synthesize primary and secondary sources.

label: Scholarly Writing
description: Produce clear, evidence-based academic writing and analyses.

label: Audience Analysis
description: Adapt content to the needs and expectations of specific audiences.

label: Comparative Analysis
description: Compare texts, cultures, or historical periods to identify relationships and differences.

label: Historical Analysis
description: Contextualize and interpret events, texts, or movements in their historical settings.

label: Cultural & Cross-cultural Analysis
description: Analyze cultural influences and interactions across contexts.

label: Policy & Program Evaluation
description: Assess policies, programs, or interventions and their impacts.

label: Data Analysis & Statistics
description: Apply statistical methods to analyze and interpret quantitative data.

label: Modeling & Regression
description: Build and interpret regression and predictive models.

label: Experimental Design & ANOVA
description: Design experiments and use ANOVA/nonparametric tests to evaluate results.

label: GIS & Geospatial Analysis
description: Use GIS tools to map, analyze, and interpret spatial data.

label: Video Production
description: Produce video content including planning, shooting, and post-production.

label: Audio & Sound Production
description: Record and edit audio for media and performance.

label: News Gathering & Reporting
description: Research, gather, and report news stories for media formats.

label: Laboratory & Field Techniques
description: Apply laboratory and field protocols for safe, reliable data or evidence collection.

label: Evidence Handling & Investigation
description: Collect, preserve, and document evidence following protocol.

label: Risk & Safety Practices
description: Identify hazards and follow safety and hazard communication procedures.

label: Project & Program Management
description: Plan, organize, and manage projects to meet objectives and deadlines.

label: Collaboration & Teamwork
description: Work effectively with others in group or ensemble settings.

label: Presentation & Performance
description: Prepare and deliver content for live or recorded performance and presentations.

label: Teaching & Training Design
description: Design and deliver instructional or training materials and sessions.

label: Ethical Practice & Trauma Sensitivity
description: Apply ethical guidelines and trauma-aware approaches in professional settings.

label: Critical Thinking & Evaluation
description: Formulate, evaluate, and defend reasoned arguments and judgments.

label: Professional Communication (Written)
description: Write clearly for professional, academic, and public audiences.

label: Professional Communication (Oral)
description: Speak clearly and persuasively in presentations, interviews, or broadcasts.

label: Software & Tool Proficiency
description: Use domain-specific software (e.g., GIS, SAS, video editors) to produce work.

label: Research Synthesis
description: Synthesize research findings into coherent summaries and recommendations.

label: Source Evaluation
description: Assess credibility, relevance, and bias in sources of information.

label: Produce & Publish Content
description: Take creative or journalistic work through production to publication or broadcast.

label: Creative Workshop & Peer Review
description: Give and receive constructive feedback to improve creative work.

label: Apply Quantitative Reasoning
description: Use quantitative methods to make evidence-based conclusions.

label: Apply Qualitative Analysis
description: Analyze qualitative data, texts, and cultural materials for patterns and meaning.

label: Adaptation & Genre Transfer
description: Adapt writing and media across formats and audiences while preserving core meaning.
